attributes.action: Keep schools closed to prevent second wave of coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: These children will then head home where their families will then catch the virus, parents going to work then will spread it on to others at their workplace and family gatherings will be a complete infection hive, before you know it, so many people’s lives will be lost and that is a risk we simply cannot take and the government must understand this or else there will be severe consequences to the people of Britain and it will be on their hands.
attributes.background: Having schools re opened is such a dangerous task, social distancing at schools simply cannot be administered. Our children are certain to catch COVID-19 while in school, with all the children playing around, screaming, fighting, sneezing and coughing it just wont end up well.
